product_name: FENTY BEAUTY by RihannaPro Filt'r Soft Matte Longwear Liquid Foundation
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeThe FENTY BEAUTY by Rihanna Pro Filt'r Soft Matte Longwear Liquid Foundation is a soft matte, longwear foundation with buildable, medium to full coverage, in a boundary-breaking range of shades.
details: DetailsBenefitsLongwearMedium-to-full coverageSoft matte finishLight-as-air, skin that looks like skinDiffuses the look of poresSweat- and humidity- resistantFor all skin types (best for normal to oily)50 shades for allFormulated WithoutOilPhthalatesParabensItem 2592558How To UsePrep: Be sure to moisturize skin before applying matte foundations, especially if your skin is dry. After moisturizing, apply your favorite Pro Filt'r Primer and let set for best results.Always shake before use to activate. When testing shades, remember to let matte foundations dry completely to find your perfect match.For full coverage: Apply 1-2 pumps of Pro Filt'r Foundation on the back of your hand. Using the Full-Bodied Foundation Brush 110, dot product onto the center of your face and blend outward.For medium, customizable coverage: Apply 1 pump of Pro Filt'r Foundation to the back of your hand. Using a damp Precision Makeup Sponge 100, begin applying product at the center of your face, or wherever coverage is desired, pressing foundation into skin and blending outward. For fuller coverage, add another pump.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Dimethicone, Talc, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polypropylene, Isododecane, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Nylon-12, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Chloride, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Glycerin, Magnesium Sulfate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Aluminum Hydroxide, Methicone, Benzoic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Propylene Carbonate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum/Fragrance, Silica, Biosaccharide Gum-4, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Paullinia Cupana Seed Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Sorbic Acid. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Prep: Be sure to moisturize skin before applying matte foundations, especially if your skin is dry. After moisturizing, apply your favorite Pro Filt'r Primer and let set for best results.Always shake before use to activate. When testing shades, remember to let matte foundations dry completely to find your perfect match.For full coverage: Apply 1-2 pumps of Pro Filt'r Foundation on the back of your hand. Using the Full-Bodied Foundation Brush 110, dot product onto the center of your face and blend outward.For medium, customizable coverage: Apply 1 pump of Pro Filt'r Foundation to the back of your hand. Using a damp Precision Makeup Sponge 100, begin applying product at the center of your face, or wherever coverage is desired, pressing foundation into skin and blending outward. For fuller coverage, add another pump.

reviews.headline: Good match
reviews.comments: It was a great match, however the product was very drying on my skin. Had to return it

reviews.headline: Great Foundation!!
reviews.comments: This product was a great choice and the value was great, the longevity and the blend is a great benefit, it's wonderful for my skin tone, No irritation, not oily, and I really don't need a powder finish unless I want to enhance the smoothness.

reviews.headline: Best foundation I have ever used
reviews.comments: I was discouraged when the color match recommendation option on here gave me three VERY different colors based off of the other foundations I use, then when I trued all three and none matched me. But I kept testing until I found the right color and OMG I'm SO glad I did. This is the prettiest foundation I have ever tried, and have tried a lot of them. It went on so smooth, gave an absolutely beautiful finish, and the coverage was nice with just one coat but was buildable to give a more full effect. And it LASTED! I wore it outside in pouring rain for 8+ hours working a renaissance faire and it didn't budge! I can't tell you how obsessed I am with it, honestly. I got it during 21 Days of Beauty at half off but will 100% pay full price in the future (and stock up any time I see it on sale again!).

reviews.headline: GREAT PRODUCT!
reviews.comments: I used to have the wrong color but #390 fits me perfectly! Had to go into the store to get it rjust right though. Will purchase again and again love it

reviews.headline: Nice foundation - online color match wrong
reviews.comments: I like the application of the foundation, and it didnt settle into my skin. I'm 47 and finding a foundation that works for my age, covers melasma and doesn't look bad is hard these day even though i have nice skin (other than hormone induced melasma). I do think the Ulta online color match system is not right. I looked like Morticia Addams in this (shade 120) when I color matched to my Armani Luminous Silk shade (4.75). Coincidentally, when I color shade matched on another makeup store website, it has it matching to shade 160. I guess I'm going to have a makeup artist shade match in person.

reviews.headline: Never gonna stop buying this!
reviews.comments: I have PCOS and I have to shave my face everyday due to excess hair growth and this helps cover up everything from having to shave. It helps me not be embarrassed and hate myself. Thank you fenty for helping with my confidence ü´∂üèª

reviews.headline: Love love love!
reviews.comments: I have been using this foundation for YEARS! Love the way it feels on my skin and the way it looks. Can use a small amount for a sheer complexion or a little more for fuller coverage.

reviews.headline: A good foundation
reviews.comments: The foundation shade matched me perfectly.

reviews.headline: I will most definitely be buying this again and again
reviews.comments: I returned another brand to go back to my Fenty brand. Hands down nothing else compares to the featherlight feel of this foundation. And it matches my skin tone perfectly.

reviews.headline: I will keep buying this product again
reviews.comments: Applies good and doesn't make my face oily

reviews.headline: Best foundation EVER
reviews.comments: I have struggled with a super oily t-zone my whole life.  This is the first liquid foundation I have ever used that is not heavy feeling, provides a nice finish, and truly keeps my skin looking fresh and non-greasy all day.  I can't recommend this product enough for those with oily skin.

reviews.headline: Buy Over & Over
reviews.comments: The best match, to the point people often think I don't have on makeup in a good way. The best.

reviews.headline: If you have dry skin do not buy
reviews.comments: Looked horrible and cakey on my skin, dried up as soon as it went on. Do not recommend.

reviews.headline: Dry
reviews.comments: So drying it settles into my skin so poorly . I don't have dry skin but this always makes my skin look so dry. I've tried it several times, years ago and i repurchased again recently to give it another shot, I wanted to like it so bad but it is the worst foundation I have ever tried

reviews.headline: BEST FOUNDATION EVER
reviews.comments: Hands down the best foundation I've ever purchased. Stayed on all day long and didn't crease where the tarte face tape would crease such as the sides of my nose, under eyes and on my chin. Couldn't recommend enough!

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: I have oily and sensitive skin and let me tell ya‚Ä¶ my makeup looked just as good at night as it did in the AM and no breakouts from it. Ive never been more impressed with a foundation in my life. Dont walk, RUN and grab this foundation! The shade range is amazing as well. Cant say enough good things about this product.

media.headline: I would definitely purchase this product again.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have dry "maturing" skin, but every other foundation made my face look soooo shiny! I have tried EVERY major brand out here, and each one has given me the same result... until this! I have been using this foundation for the past 4 years and I recommend it to everyone I know! It does not clog my pores, over dry out my face, and stays matte all day. There are some things that others may consider cons, but there is just a better technique for application to keep these concerns from ruining your Fenty experience... 1. This foundation melts into your skin quickly, so work in sections. I usually start on the lower side of my jaw, and once a bee coverage is there, I begin moving inward to my nose and under eye. If you try to apply this to your entire face at the beginning, it simply won't work. 2. If it seems cakey, apply with a makeup sponge, again, working in small sections. The moisture in the sponge with help disburse the product allowing for more buildable coverage. 3. If you think you are sensitive to this formula, use a primer on your face first. he primer can build a barrier between your skin and the foundation. This will not work for those with severe allergic reactions, but for the mild ones, it seems to help. 4. If you think this is "too drying", use a heavier moisturizer. I have EXTREMELY dry and sensitive skin. Ya girl can't even wear sunblock because I am allergic to the metals in it kind of sensitive. But if you moisturize with a quality moisturizer (NOT A DRUGSTORE BRAND!), and let it fully absorb before applying your primer and foundation, it will keep your skin hydrated while still giving you a matte look throughout the day. 5. The formula is not necessarily changing, but your skin is. The winter will cause our skin to be drier, while the summer will typically be more oily. Along with the fluctuation in moisture, the tone changes as well. Most people have a winter, spring, and summer color. Sometimes a fall one as well! Even Rihanna has 4 different shades she wears depending on the weather and season. If you find that the color is off, that's ok. Just go a shade up or down, and since the travel sizes are still being sold, I would recommend getting a few to see what shades will work for you. Hopefully these tips can help someone!
faceoff_positive.headline: Best. Foundation. Ever. Period.

faceoff_negative.comments:
I read the reviews  on this, and it all sounded very nice. I must have gotten the wrong type of foundation from Fenty Beauty. This matte doesn't sit well on my skin. I usually have dry skin and patches. The sides of my nose has gotten sunburned and this flu nation clings to it and it's very noticeable. Probably, because it's a matte. 

The foundation sat on my skin like weird. It is too dry to dab on with a sponge. Like when I put it on with my fingers here and there so I can blend it with my sponge, but it drys before I can get my sponge on it. It is a different type of foundation. I feel like you have to have Super dewy skin for this to work for you. My skin has been soft and fine with my regular color pop foundation which is a hydrating foundation, because I have been drinking a lot of water, I don't need moisturizer everyday at night to keep my skin soft other than the areas that recently got dry. 

I set my foundation under my eyes and some areas of my face with my sponge. It got caked on my chin and under my eyes. One day the foundation I guess had a date with the powder because all you could See was small-round powder on my chin. Weird. Definitely didn't set that area with powder the next day. I use the banana powder. Maybe it's too heavy or not the right weight? Setting my under eyes looked rough but the foundation was light feeling. 

Overall, the foundation was Light. Didn't feel like I had anything heavy on my face. The color I choose was too light. I felt like I was a vampire even with when I contoured. This isn't for my skin. I have to stick to hydrating foundations like color pop.
faceoff_negative.headline: Dries Too Fast.
